item.title: Hugo - Static Site Generator
item.description: TODO {{ .Site.Title }} {{ .Page.Title }} {{ partial "meta.html" . }} {{ .Title }} {{ .Content }} {{ block "main" . }}{{ end }} {{ define "main" }}<p>sth</p>{{ end }} {{ print .Page.Title }} {{ $style := resources.Get "sass/main.scss" | resources.ToCSS | resources.Minify }} <link rel="stylesheet" href="{{ $style.Permalink }}"> Create new hugo website. hugo new site NAME Modify baseURL and title values in config.toml file. Run Hugo server in background.
